neighbors.name: Tarrence James Crews
neighbors.claims: No public records or news reports naming Tarrence James Crews in connection with civic activities or development issues could be found. A search of Baltimore County hearing archives yielded no entries under Crews’s name as of 2025.

approach_recommendations.engage: Reach out in a friendly, personal way to introduce the project and invite questions. Given his lack of public involvement, focus on listening to any concerns he raises and address common issues calmly.

neighbors.name: Linda L. Cain
neighbors.claims: Linda Lee Cain, 82, passed away in May 2025 and was remembered for her deep appreciation of nature and the outdoors ([www.cremationsocietyofmd.com](https://www.cremationsocietyofmd.com/obituaries/linda-cain#:~:text=Linda%20Lee%20,appreciation%20for%20nature%20and%20family)) ([www.cremationsocietyofmd.com](https://www.cremationsocietyofmd.com/obituaries/linda-cain#:~:text=Linda%E2%80%99s%20adventurous%20spirit%20shone%20brightly,time%20spent%20with%20her%20family)). She was an active member of the Catholic Community of Relay in Baltimore County, often volunteering (such as ringing the church bell) as part of her community life ([www.cremationsocietyofmd.com](https://www.cremationsocietyofmd.com/obituaries/linda-cain#:~:text=A%20woman%20of%20faith%20and,tradition%20and%20celebration%20that%20brought)). No public statements or documented positions by Cain on development or land use issues were located in available records.
neighbors.influence_justification: Church volunteer; not in public office

approach_recommendations.engage: Coordinate engagement through her family (spouse or adult children) given her passing. Emphasize the project’s respect for nature and quiet surroundings, aligning with Linda’s lifelong love of the outdoors.

neighbors.name: Sharyn L. Herman
neighbors.claims: No public information was found indicating that Sharyn L. Herman holds any civic positions or has spoken out on local development matters. A review of county records and meeting minutes did not show her name in connection with community or land use issues.

approach_recommendations.engage: Approach her one-on-one in a neighborly manner to discuss the project. Since she has no known stance, start by asking if she has any concerns and provide clear, factual information in a low-key, respectful conversation.

overview_summary: No neighbors were found to have a clearly supportive or opposing stance on development; all 3 are classified as unknown stance. None of these individuals holds any formal leadership role in the community, and all are considered to have low local influence.
